title._content: [Petersburg, Va. Quarters of photographers attached to Engineer Corps in front of Petersburg] (LOC)

description._content: [Petersburg, Va. Quarters of photographers attached to Engineer Corps in front of Petersburg] 1865 March. 1 negative : glass, wet collodion. Notes: Corresponding print is in LOT 4172-H. Forms part of Civil War glass negative collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Tents--Virginia--Petersburg--1860-1870. Photographers--Virginia--Petersburg--1860-1870. Log cabins--Virginia--Petersburg--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865. Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsc.00169 Call Number: LC-B8184- 7347
